text:
Context engineering is the new prompting.
 
 Save this framework to test it:

→ Role: Define what the model should do.
→ Objective: State the goal of the interaction.
→ Context Package: Include all relevant context.
→ Workflow: Outline the process to follow.
→ Context Handling-Rules: Set rules.
→ Output Format: Specify the answer format. 
→ First Action: Describe the model’s first step.

LLMs perform best with rich context; the more you provide, the better their answers.

It's all about "context engineering" more than "prompt engineering". I wrote a free blog about it how to master it: https://lnkd.in/dDfJK_Mp.

PS: I share how I master AI with words, not code, on my blog "how-to-ai.guide". Unsubscribe anytime.
